long_description: Keep the Black Diamond Ion LED Headlamp in your pocket or stashed in your pack. At a mere 48 grams, it's so light and compact there's no reason to ever be left in the dark again. 80 lumens on high with 8 hr. battery life (down to 0.25 lux at 2m); 200 hrs. battery life on low. PowerSlide lets you turn the headlamp on and off with a simple touch. Sealed electronics. Red night-vision mode. Lockout switch helps avoid inadvertent, battery-draining operation while stowed in your pack. The Black Diamond Ion LED Headlamp comes with lithium AAA batteries that have a 10-year shelf life; alkaline batteries (not included) can also be used as replacements.
short_description: Keep the Black Diamond Ion LED Headlamp in your pocket or stashed in your pack. At a mere 48 grams, it's so light and compact there's no reason to ever be left in the dark again.
